casebody.data:
Charles J. THOMAS, etc., et al., Appellants,
v.
Matthew D. FARRAGO et al., Defendants, Anthony G. Curreri, et al., Respondents. 2017-1187 Court of Appeals of New York. February 13, 2018

Motion for leave to appeal dismissed upon the ground that the order sought to be appealed from does not finally determine the action within the meaning of the Constitution.
